name: Enshrouded Bosses Pre-Alpha
description:
Controls:

movement- W,A,S,D or arrow keys
attack- Spacebar
heal- Z

Emotion Bubble:
The little bubble in the bottom left corner becomes more and more visible as you approach an emotion state. Eventually there will be a countdown to the emotion state. The color of the bubble will tell you what emotion you are about to have.

Red- Anger(faster movement, more damage)
Blue- Sadness(slower movement,  attacks do no damage but still push enemies away)
White- Paranoia(attack switches to ranged)
Yellow- Fear(run away from enemies automatically)
Purple- Pride (Can only attack once for 8 seconds but attack is large and does massive damage)
Green- Anxiety (cannot move)

Healing:
After every emotion state you will receive a healing charge. You can press the z key to activate it, which will freeze you for a few moments. This will consume the charge and heal you 1 hp.

Bosses:
There is a short pause before every boss fight. This will allow for an animation to play before the fight and the ui will change signaling the beginning of the fight. However, these animations/ui changes are not implemented yet.
